turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I wanted to get a pizza from Bella Luna. Can you help me order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place an order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four large pizzas for carry out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. What toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're ordering from Bella Luna, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yup, i know the place.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah, so then I want one all veggie. I want one bacon cheeseburger special. I want one mushroom and tomato, and I want one linguisa with bell peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, it doesn't look like bella luna has bacon cheeseburger.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want another option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have ground meat as a topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they do, yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Let me get ground beef, onion, and extra cheese for that one, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me read over your order to confirm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 with ground beef, onion, and extra cheese, 1 mushroom and tomatoes, and 1 linguisa with bell peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it. Can you make it the crust for all of those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sweet!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thick crust on all four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45.69 is the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, that's a pretty good price. All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: right? i thought so too. Did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, we'll pick it up as soon as you let us know that it will be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, i've placed the order for pick up. It'll be ready in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now I think that's it, thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy those pizzas. You're welcome.
